content: 3 more times round 15 *k5 k3tog repeat from * 3 more times round 17 *k3 k3tog repeat from * 3 more times round 18 knit - 16 sts remain finishing cut the yarn and pass through remaining stitches weave in ends and block enjoy your finished hat bonjour / hi hat page 2 - www espacetricot com - © espace tricot 2020 - for personal use only
